Articles.Content:
Hi,

I want to delete contracts that require anything (exploring, puting a probe into orbit, etc...) with a celestial body that I know by a CelestialBody variable.

Does anyone know how to do that ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-02T20:37:11Z" title="07/02/2015 08:37  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 2, 2015</time> by simon56modder**

> 
> [**Rejector**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108316-Rejector-v1-1-0)

I want to access features like these from code, but I'll check in Rejector's source, thanks ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
